name: Cannon Game (Fortem)
description:
Red boxes must crash against the bars around the cannon. For the rest of the colors, you must shoot using a different key depending on the color of the box. 

You will need good reflexes and speed! It's a bit difficult, but you get used to it after a few tries.

It's my first "complete" game, so any recommendations and advice will be very appreciated! 

Thank you very much for giving it a go, I hope you enjoy it!
